items.summary: In the Total Orders tab (TotalOrdersTab.tsx), after grouping Pending/ReturnFromHallmark orders by design code, sort the orders within each design code group by overdue days in descending order (most overdue / oldest order date first). Overdue days should be calculated as the number of days elapsed since the order's orderDate. Orders with a null or missing orderDate should be placed at the bottom of each group.
